author: gsim
msg: Modified handling of reason for closing in peer to work around race between worker and reader where a connection.close is followed by the socket closing (this is a bit of a hack).
Modified test for queue_purge to do cleanup on new connection.
Separated testing of scenario where closed channel is used from that where an unopened channel is used.

author: gsim
msg: Close connection when connection.close is sent to client.
